content: विषयः {@--1@} An object of sense; (these are five, corresponding to the five organs of sense; रूप, रस, गंध, स्पर्श and शब्द corresponding to the eye, tongue, nose, skin, and ear); श्रुतिविषयगुणा या स्थिता व्याप्य विश्वं <ls>Ś. 1. 1.</ls> {@--2@} A worldly object or concern, an affair, a transaction. {@--3@} The pleasures of sense, worldly or sensual objects (usually in <ab>pl.</ab>) यौवने विषयैषिणां <ls>R. 1. 8</ls>; शब्दादीन् विषयान्भोक्तुं <ls n="R.">10. 25</ls>; विषयव्यावृत्तकौतूहलः <ls>V. 1. 9</ls>; निर्विष्टविषयस्नेहः <ls n="V.">12. 1</ls>, <ls n="V.">3. 70</ls>, <ls n="V.">8. 10</ls>, <ls n="V.">19. 49</ls>; <ls>Bg. 2. 59.</ls> {@--4@} An object, a thing, matter; नार्यो न जग्मुर्विषयांतराणि <ls>R. 7. 12</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 89.</ls> {@--5@} An object or thing aimed at, mark, object; भूयिष्ठमन्यविषया न तु दृष्टिरस्याः <ls>Ś. 1. 31</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 40.</ls> {@--6@} Scope, range, reach, compass; सौमित्रेरपि पत्रिणामविषये तत्र प्रिये क्वासि भोः <ls>U. 3. 45</ls>; यस्मिन्नीश्वर इत्यनन्यविषयः शब्दो यथार्थाक्षरः <ls>V. 1. 1</ls>; सकलवचनानामविषयः <ls>Māl. 1. 30</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 1.">36</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 19</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 17.</ls> {@--7@} Department, sphere, province, field, element; सर्वत्रौदरिकस्याभ्यवहार्यमेव विषयः <ls>V. 3.</ls> {@--8@} A subject, subject-matter, topic; अयि मलयज महिमायं कस्य गिरामस्तु विषयस्ते <ls>Bv. 1. 11</ls>; so शृंगारविषयको ग्रंथः ‘treating of love’. {@--9@} The topic or subject to be explained, general head; the first of the five members of an Adhikaraṇa <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--10@} A place, spot; परिसरविषयेषु लीढमुक्ताः <ls>Ki. 5. 38.</ls> {@--11@} A country, realm, domain, territory, district, kingdom; <ls>Pt. 2. 2.</ls> {@--12@} A refuge, an asylum. {@--13@} A collection of villages. {@--14@} A lover, husband. {@--15@} Semen virile. {@--16@} A religious observance. {@--17@} A symbolical expression for the number ‘five.’ (विषये means ‘with regard or reference to,’ ‘in respect of’, ‘in the case of’, ‘regarding’, ‘cancerning’; या तत्रास्ते युवतिविषये सृष्टिराद्येव धातुः <ls>Me. 82</ls>; स्त्रीणा विषये; धनविषये &c.).
